p: The compounds stigmasterol, Î³-sitosterol, and a not identified (ni) molecule (422 g/mol) were found again in the green callus sample of the treatment with 2 mg/L BA with cultivation in the light with (salicylic acid or chitosan) or without (control) elicitation, similar to the calli obtained in the dark with 2.4-D ( Table 5).
